refnamediv.refpurpose: Perform case folding on a string

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
str
The string being converted.
mode
The mode of the conversion. It can be one of MB_CASE_UPPER, MB_CASE_LOWER, or MB_CASE_TITLE.
encoding
